bug.author: TobyRoseman
bug.summary: tc.version_info is not list in the API docs
bug.description: The top level API docs contains no link for tc.version_info. Nothing under tc.version_info can be viewed with the API docs webpage.

comments.comment: I just tried to fix this issue. Unfortunately, there is no good way to fix it. Everything under tc.version_info are variables not methods. In Python variable can't have docstrings. So API docs don't really make sense here.
